verses.text: When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall bring thee into the land whither thou goest to possess it, and hath cast out many nations before thee, the Hittites , and the Girgashites , and the Amorites , and the Canaanites , and the Perizzites , and the Hivites , and the Jebusites , seven nations greater and mightier than thou;

And when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall deliver them before thee; thou shalt smite them, \add and\add* utterly destroy them; thou shalt make no covenant with them, nor shew mercy unto them:
Neither shalt thou make marriages with them; thy daughter thou shalt not give unto his son , nor his daughter shalt thou take unto thy son.
For they will turn away thy son from following me, that they may serve other gods : so will the anger of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be kindled against you, and destroy thee suddenly.

But thus shall ye deal with them; ye shall destroy their altars , and break down their images , and cut down their groves , and burn their graven images with fire.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft their images: Heb. their statues, or, pillars\f*

For thou \add art\add* an holy people unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God : the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath chosen thee to be a special people unto himself, above all people that \add are\add* upon the face of the earth.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did not set his love upon you, nor choose you, because ye were more in number than any people ; for ye \add were\add* the fewest of all people :

But because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* loved you, and because he would keep the oath which he had sworn unto your fathers , hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* brought you out with a mighty hand , and redeemed you out of the house of bondmen , from the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt.

Know therefore that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , he \add is\add* God , the faithful God , which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him and keep his commandments to a thousand generations ;
And repayeth them that hate him to their face , to destroy them: he will not be slack to him that hateth him, he will repay him to his face.
Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments , and the statutes , and the judgments , which I command thee this day , to do them. \p

¶ Wherefore it shall come to pass, if ye hearken to these judgments , and keep , and do them, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall keep unto thee the covenant and the mercy which he sware unto thy fathers :\f + \fr 7.12 \ft if: Heb. because\f*

And he will love thee, and bless thee, and multiply thee: he will also bless the fruit of thy womb , and the fruit of thy land , thy corn , and thy wine , and thine oil , the increase of thy kine , and the flocks of thy sheep , in the land which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee.
Thou shalt be blessed above all people : there shall not be male or female barren among you, or among your cattle.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will take away from thee all sickness , and will put none of the evil diseases of Egypt , which thou knowest , upon thee; but will lay them upon all \add them\add* that hate thee.

And thou shalt consume all the people which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall deliver thee; thine eye shall have no pity upon them: neither shalt thou serve their gods ; for that \add will be\add* a snare unto thee.
If thou shalt say in thine heart , These nations \add are\add* more than I; how can I dispossess them?
Thou shalt not be afraid of them: \add but\add* shalt well remember what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God did unto Pharaoh , and unto all Egypt ;

The great temptations which thine eyes saw , and the signs , and the wonders , and the mighty hand , and the stretched out arm , whereby the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God brought thee out : so shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God do unto all the people of whom thou art afraid.
Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God will send the hornet among them, until they that are left , and hide themselves from thee, be destroyed.
Thou shalt not be affrighted at them: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God \add is\add* among you, a mighty God and terrible.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God will put out those nations before thee by little and little : thou mayest not consume them at once , lest the beasts of the field increase upon thee.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft put…: Heb. pluck off\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall deliver them unto thee , and shall destroy them with a mighty destruction , until they be destroyed.\f + \fr 7.23 \ft unto…: Heb. before thy face\f*
And he shall deliver their kings into thine hand , and thou shalt destroy their name from under heaven : there shall no man be able to stand before thee, until thou have destroyed them.

The graven images of their gods shall ye burn with fire : thou shalt not desire the silver or gold \add that is\add* on them, nor take \add it\add* unto thee, lest thou be snared therein: for it \add is\add* an abomination to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God.

Neither shalt thou bring an abomination into thine house , lest thou be a cursed thing like it: \add but\add* thou shalt utterly detest it, and thou shalt utterly abhor it; for it \add is\add* a cursed thing.
